attributes.action: MAKE SURE LORD MYNERS IS KEPT OUT OF PATTENS PENSION NEGOTIATIONS.
attributes.additional_details: With Lord Patten sure to be entitled to HUGE severance and pension pots arising out of his 3 years of abject failure at the BBC we implore you to make sure that Lord Myners is kept well away from the negotiations because we simply cannot afford another Fred Goodwin pension pot debacle which the dishonourable Myners states, often, he is very proud of.
